message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with the opportunity to purchase this truly valuable product. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.  To kick off our discussion, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,300,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price you've proposed. I would like to make a counteroffer of $900,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but my ownership of this product has significant value to me.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,200,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,100,000 for the product.
